T02dvtasutu:12: gṛhītaṃ kiṃ nu martyena kiṃ vā tad yad ihojjhitaṃ /

T02dvtasutu:17: abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ kṣānti prajñā tīkṣṇam ihāyudham /

T02dvtasutu:23: vitarkaḥ kuśalaś cauro dhanaṃ śīlaṃ satāṃ mataṃ /
T02dvtasutu:24: te cāpi muṣitā loke yaiḥ śīlaṃ vinipātitam /

T02dvtasutu:57: kiṃ tat priyam apathyaṃ ca kiṃ vā pathyaṃ na ca priyaṃ ko vā pīḍākaro vyādhiḥ ko 'sāv eko bhiṣag varaḥ /

T02dvtasutu:60: rāgaḥ pīḍākaro vyādhir buddhaś caiko bhiṣag varaḥ /
